SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.model

Interface Model

All Known Implementing Classes:
ObjModel
public interface Model

Model

The Model interface represents a 3D model composed of vertices and faces. It provides methods to access information about the model's vertices and faces.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Model
    apply(UnaryOperator<Vector3> operator)
    Applies a given unary operator to each vertex of the model and returns a new model with the modified vertices.
    Face
    face(int index)
    Returns the face at the specified index.
    Face[]
    faces()
    Returns an array of faces that make up the model.
    int
    numFaces()
    Returns the number of faces in the model.
    int
    numVertices()
    Returns the number of vertices in the model.
    Vector3
    vertex(int index)
    Returns the vertex at the specified index.
    Vector3[]
    vertices()
    Returns an array of vertices that make up the model.

  • Method Details

    • vertices

      @Nonnull Vector3[] vertices()
      Returns an array of vertices that make up the model.
      Returns:
      An array of vertices.

    • vertex

      @Nonnull Vector3 vertex(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns the vertex at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the vertex to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The vertex at the given index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • numVertices

      int numVertices()
      Returns the number of vertices in the model.
      Returns:
      The number of vertices.

      Returns an array of faces that make up the model.
      Returns:

    • face

      Returns the face at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the face to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The face at the given index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • numFaces

      int numFaces()
      Returns the number of faces in the model.
      Returns:
      The number of faces.

    • apply

      @Nonnull Model apply(@Nonnull UnaryOperator<Vector3> operator)
      Applies a given unary operator to each vertex of the model and returns a new model with the modified vertices.
      Parameters:
      operator - The unary operator to be applied to each vertex.
      Returns:
      A new model with the modified vertices.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the operator is null.
